definitions.definition: A small, crepuscular rodent of the genus Chinchilla , native to the Andes Mountains , prized for their very soft fur and often kept as pets .
The fur of a chinchilla, used for clothing.
A variety of Persian cat with white fur and green eyes.

main_definition: ( countable ) A small, crepuscular rodent of the genus Chinchilla , native to the Andes Mountains , prized for their very soft fur and often kept as pets .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The fur of a chinchilla, used for clothing.
A variety of Persian cat with white fur and green eyes.
